title: [BUG] System.DllNotFoundException: libSkiaSharp when using SkiaSharp.Blazor.Views in Blazor WASM in .NET 9 RC2
body:
### Description I created a new WASM project using **SkiaSharp.Blazor.Views** to utilize `SKPath`, but it throws an exception, preventing access to the SkiaSharp object. My project references the following package: **.NET 8:** https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8f04ba38-4760-41a5-baf4-68349638dc58 **.NET 8 Sample:** [SkiaSharpNET8.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17377803/SkiaSharpNET8.zip) **.NET 9:** https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/190564b7-c46a-4710-8219-d894141041cb **.NET 9 Sample:** [SkiaSharpNET9.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17377811/SkiaSharpNET9.zip) This issue only occurs in .NET 9; it worked perfectly in .NET 8. Could you please investigate this issue and provide suggestions? ### Code **Code Snippet:** Home.razor ```razor @page "/" @using SkiaSharp;
SkiaSharp NET 9
@code { SKPath DrawingPath = new SKPath(); } ``` **.NET9 Sample:** [SkiaSharpNET9.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17377680/SkiaSharpNET9.zip) ### Expected Behavior Ensure the sample runs without exceptions, similar to how it worked in .NET 8. ### Actual Behavior It throws a System.DllNotFoundException: libSkiaSharp exception. ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/55c47e0d-4ec9-4671-aed9-76ec2c6c27cb) ### Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.8 (Current) ### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.6 (Deprecated) ### IDE / Editor Visual Studio (Windows) ### Platform / Operating System Windows ### Platform / Operating System Version Windows 11 ### Devices _No response_ ### Relevant Screenshots
